title: Nicky Katt, Boston Public Actor, Dead at 54
description: Nicky Katt, whose TV and film credits include Boston Public and Dazed and Confused, has died. He was 54. The news of Katt’s death was confirmed by his attorney, John Sloss, to our sister site The Hollywood Reporter. A cause of death has not yet been revealed. On the TV side, Katt was best known for […]
author: Claire Franken
